spec_data.Name: simcrs-devel
spec_data.Description:
This package contains the header files, shared libraries and
development helper tools for simcrs. If you would like to develop
programs using simcrs, you will need to install simcrs-devel.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 06:33:07 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Header files, libraries and development helper tools for simcrs
